text: تِلْكَ ٱلْجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِى نُورِثُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا مَن كَانَ تَقِيًّا

translation.en.sahih: That is Paradise, which We give as inheritance to those of Our servants who were fearing of Allah.
translation.id.indonesian: Itulah surga yang akan Kami wariskan kepada hamba-hamba Kami yang selalu bertakwa.
